title: Minority Report 2002 DVDRip XviD AR
description:
Minority Report (2002)

Writing credits
Philip K. Dick	 	(short story)

Scott Frank	 	(screenplay) and
Jon Cohen	 	(screenplay)

Genre:
Action / Crime / Drama / Mystery / Sci-Fi / Thriller

Plot Outline: In the year 2054 A.D. crime is virtually eliminated from Washington D.C. thanks to an elite law enforcing squad "Precrime". They use three genetically altered humans (called "Pre-Cogs") with special powers to see into the future and predict crimes beforehand. John Anderton heads Precrime and believes the system&#039;s flawlessness steadfastly. However one day the Pre-Cogs predict that Anderton will commit a murder himself in the next 36 hours. Worse, Anderton doesn&#039;t even know the victim. He decides to get to the mystery&#039;s core by finding out the &#039;minority report&#039; which means the prediction of the female Pre-Cog Agatha that "might" tell a different story and prove Anderton innocent.
